org.apache.hadoop.fs.swift.util

类 SwiftUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.swift.util.SwiftUtils

  • public final class SwiftUtils
extends Object
    Various utility classes for SwiftFS support

    • 方法详细资料

      • joinPaths

        public static String joinPaths(String path1,
               String path2)
        Join two (non null) paths, inserting a forward slash between them if needed
        参数:
        path1 - first path
        path2 - second path
        返回:
        the combined path

      • isDirectory

        public static boolean isDirectory(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus fileStatus)
        This test contains the is-directory logic for Swift, so if changed there is only one place for it.
        参数:
        fileStatus - status to examine
        返回:
        true if we consider this status to be representative of a directory.

      • isFilePretendingToBeDirectory

        public static boolean isFilePretendingToBeDirectory(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus fileStatus)
        Test for the entry being a file that is treated as if it is a directory
        参数:
        fileStatus - status
        返回:
        true if it meets the rules for being a directory

      • isRootDir

        public static boolean isRootDir(SwiftObjectPath swiftObject)
        Predicate: Is a swift object referring to the root direcory?
        参数:
        swiftObject - object to probe
        返回:
        true iff the object refers to the root

      • debug

        public static void debug(org.apache.commons.logging.Log log,
         String text,
         Object... args)
        Sprintf() to the log iff the log is at debug level. If the log is not at debug level, the printf operation is skipped, so no time is spent generating the string.
        参数:
        log - log to use
        text - text message
        args - args arguments to the print statement

      • debugEx

        public static void debugEx(org.apache.commons.logging.Log log,
           String text,
           Exception ex)
        Log an exception (in text and trace) iff the log is at debug
        参数:
        log - Log to use
        text - text message
        ex - exception

      • trace

        public static void trace(org.apache.commons.logging.Log log,
         String text,
         Object... args)
        Sprintf() to the log iff the log is at trace level. If the log is not at trace level, the printf operation is skipped, so no time is spent generating the string.
        参数:
        log - log to use
        text - text message
        args - args arguments to the print statement

      • partitionFilenameFromNumber

        public static String partitionFilenameFromNumber(int partNumber)
        Given a partition number, calculate the partition value. This is used in the SwiftNativeOutputStream, and is placed here for tests to be able to calculate the filename of a partition.
        参数:
        partNumber - part number
        返回:
        a string to use as the filename

      • ls

        public static String ls(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fileSystem,
        org.apache.hadoop.fs.Path path)
                 throws IOException
        List a a path to string
        参数:
        fileSystem - filesystem
        path - directory
        返回:
        a listing of the filestatuses of elements in the directory, one to a line, precedeed by the full path of the directory
        抛出:
        IOException - connectivity problems

      • fileStatsToString

        public static String fileStatsToString(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileStatus[] stats,
                       String separator)
        Take an array of filestats and convert to a string (prefixed w/ a [01] counter
        参数:
        stats - array of stats
        separator - separator after every entry
        返回:
        a stringified set

      • validateReadArgs

        public static void validateReadArgs(byte[] buffer,
                    int off,
                    int len)
        Verify that the basic args to a read operation are valid; throws an exception if not -with meaningful text includeing
        参数:
        buffer - destination buffer
        off - offset
        len - number of bytes to read
        抛出:
        NullPointerException - null buffer
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - on any invalid range.
